    usageAndExitIfHelp detects if --help was an argument, and prints the options if a pClassNameUsage.txt file has been created and placed in the [pClassName project]/src/main/resources directory, it will be printed out.

    static boolean version​(java.lang.String[] pArgs, java.lang.String[] args)
    version checks to see if one of the pArgs arg is --version If so, it will print out on stdout the version from the args list, and return true
